label: 瘧
説明文: Also read eyami.  The word used here, gyaku or eyami (瘧), was used to designate a number of illnesses that are quite distinct by modern medical thinking, including malaria (or any disease with similar ague-like symptoms) and the plague. Source: Gyokuyō, 8th Day, 8th Month, Angen 1 (1175). [玉葉]
